markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Prisoner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=900)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Most who end up in a jail, dungeon, or prison are just biding their time until their imprisonment ends, trying to find ways to make it through interminable days of boredom and deprivation. Some, however, may use their time on the inside to strengthen their criminal connections. Using force and intimidation to gain status among other prisoners, they create makeshift weapons to take down their enemies and give them an edge if escape becomes possible. Even for prisoners who don't become involved in the world of prison politics, learning to stand up for themselves and projecting an air of toughness can become essential for survival in a place where people have little left to lose.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Prisoner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=900)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 215</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +3, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
shiv

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 17

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shiv +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The prisoner deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Surprise Attack**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the prisoner.

**You're Next** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** The prisoner reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points; **Effect** The prisoner attempts an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check with a +2 circumstance bonus to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a single creature it can see and that can see them.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-184" />
name: Prisoner
